item.description:
Come dance the night away with garba, raas, Bollywood, and bhangra!

Take advantage of the Navratri Garba season by coming out to Harvard Hungama! Harvard Hungama is Dharma's annual garba, raas, and bhangra extravaganza. Attracting hundreds of students from colleges all over, Hungama is one of the largest garba events in Boston!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Garba and Raas are traditional dances of Gujarat, a western state in India. Characterized by rhythmic movement, both dances emphasize LOTS of group participation.

Bhangra is the vibrant dance of the northern Indian state of Punjab characterized by the beat of a dhol and by easy hand and feet movements.

*Saturday, October 13th, 2012*

9PM - 1AM

GARBA: 9 PM - 10PM

RAAS: 10PM - 11:30 PM

BHANGRA: 11:30 PM - 1 AM

Harvard ID not necessary. Open to public.

Cover charge: $7 on the door (cash only)

Lowell Dining Hall
item.name: *Harvard Garba 2012: SAVE THE DATE!*
